title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 703.1 - Substance form
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 703.1 - Substance form

State Regulations
A water quality standard, guidance value or groundwater
effluent limitation includes all (total) forms of the substance, unless
indicated otherwise. Where a standard or guidance value is for a specific form
of the substance, water quality-based effluent limitations for SPDES permits
may include other forms of the substance to account for changes in the
substance that occur in the receiving water. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
703.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
